item.Q:
Write the character:
introduce; lie between; between
item.A:
jiè
介绍 (介紹) jièshào to present; introduction; to introduce

效 (strokes unavailable)
xiào
效果 xiàoguǒ result; effect

item.Q:
Write the character:
head; chief; first (occasion, thing etc); classifier for poems
item.A:
shǒu
首先 shǒuxiān first (of all); in the first place

item.Q:
Write the character:
hostage; substance; nature; quality
item.A:
质 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 質
zhì
物质 (物質) wùzhì matter; substance; material; materialistic

item.Q:
Write the character:
example; precedent; rule; case; instance
item.A:
lì
例如 lìrú for example; for instance; such as

item.Q:
Write the character:
an interjection; to express realization or agreement (yes, oh, right etc)
item.A:
唉 (strokes unavailable)
āi
唉声叹气 (唉聲嘆氣) āishēngtànqì heave deep sighs; sigh in despair

traditional: 職
zhí
职工 (職工) zhígōng workers; staff

item.Q:
Write the character:
again; recover; reply to a letter; to repeat; to duplicate
item.A:
traditional: 復
fù
恢复 (恢復) huīfù to reinstate; to resume; to restore; to recover; to regain

item.Q:
Write the character:
to transport; to lose
item.A:
输 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 輸
shū
运输 (運輸) yùnshū transport; haulage; transit

item.Q:
Write the character:
festival; section; segment; point; part; to economize; to save; temperate; classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses
item.A:
traditional: 節
jié
调节 (調節) tiáojié adjust; regulate

traditional: 規
guī
规定 (規定) guīdìng provision; to fix; to set; to formulate; to stipulate; to provide

zhù
注意 zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)

item.Q:
Write the character:
the whole of; to finish; to complete; complete; full; finished; surname Bi
item.A:
traditional: 畢
bì
毕业 (畢業) bìyè graduation; to graduate; to finish school

item.Q:
Write the character:
to research; to check; to investigate; to examine; to refer to; to search
item.A:
chá
检查 (檢查) jiǎnchá inspection; examine

item.Q:

item.A:
热 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 熱
rè

yóu
石油 shíyóu oil; petroleum

traditional: 館
guǎn
大使馆 (大使館) dàshǐguǎn embassy

态 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 態
tài
状态 (狀態) zhuàngtài state of affairs; state; mode

item.Q:
Write the character:
to stop; to halt; to park (a car)
item.A:
tíng
停止 tíngzhǐ to stop; to halt; to cease

Write the character: fú

item.A:
good fortune; happiness; luck; abbr. for Fujian 福建 province; surname Fu
幸福 xìngfú blessed; happiness; happy
lìrú for example; for instance; such as

traditional: 規定
guīdìng provision; to fix; to set; to formulate; to stipulate; to provide

traditional: 物質
wùzhì matter; substance; material; materialistic
zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)

traditional: 質量
zhìliàng quality; mass (in physics)

traditional: 性質
xìngzhì nature; characteristic
shǒuxiān first (of all); in the first place
xiàoguǒ result; effect

traditional: 職工
zhígōng workers; staff

traditional: 運輸
yùnshū transport; haulage; transit

traditional: 加熱
jīarè heating
bǐlì proportion; scale

traditional: 態度
tàidu manner; bearing; attitude; approach
yǒuxiào effective; in effect; valid

traditional: 調節
tiáojié adjust; regulate

traditional: 調查
diàochá investigation; inquiry; to investigate; to survey; survey; (opinion) poll

traditional: 輸出
shūchū to export; to output

traditional: 本質
běnzhì essence; nature; innate character; intrinsic quality
miànqián in front of; facing; presence
bùguǎn no matter (what, how); regardless of; no matter
